Config.Resource: SELECT DT_FIN_MEMBER.`LABEL`,DT_FIN_MEMBER.`PHONE`,DT_FIN_MEMBER.`LAST_LOGIN_DATE`, DT_FIN_CUSTOMER.`OUID`,DT_FIN_CUSTOMER.`OVLD`,DT_FIN_CUSTOMER.`GUID`, DT_FIN_CUSTOMER.`MARKETER_ID`,DT_FIN_CUSTOMER.`MARKETER_LID`,DT_FIN_CUSTOMER.`LINK_ID`,DT_FIN_CUSTOMER.`STATISTICS_ID`, DT_FIN_CUSTOMER.`MARRY_CD`,DT_FIN_CUSTOMER.`EDUCATION_CD`,DT_FIN_CUSTOMER.`INCOME_CD`,DT_FIN_CUSTOMER.`BUSINESS_CD`, DT_FIN_CUSTOMER.`LAST_MESSAGE_DATE`,DT_FIN_CUSTOMER.`INVESTMENT_TOTAL`,DT_FIN_CUSTOMER.`INVESTMENT_COUNT`, DT_FIN_CUSTOMER.`REDEMPTION_TOTAL`,DT_FIN_CUSTOMER.`REDEMPTION_COUNT`,DT_FIN_CUSTOMER.`NETINVESTMENT`, DT_FIN_CUSTOMER.`INTEREST_TOTAL`,DT_FIN_CUSTOMER.`NOTE`,DT_FIN_CUSTOMER.`CREATE_USER_ID`,DT_FIN_CUSTOMER.`CREATE_DATE`, DT_FIN_CUSTOMER.`UPDATE_USER_ID`,DT_FIN_CUSTOMER.`UPDATE_DATE` FROM DT_FIN_CUSTOMER,DT_FIN_MEMBER WHERE DT_FIN_CUSTOMER.`OUID`=DT_FIN_MEMBER.`OUID` AND MARKETER_ID={marketerid} AND (DT_FIN_MEMBER.`LABEL` LIKE {keyword} OR DT_FIN_MEMBER.`PHONE` LIKE {keyword}) limit {offset},{pagesize}
SELECT SUM(PV) PV FROM CL_FIN_CUSTOMER_PRODUCT_PV WHERE MEMBER_ID={memberid}
